question: Which of the following ministries deal with the subject of ‘urban local government’ at the Centre?
option1: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
explanation:
The subject of ‘urban local government’ is handled by the following ministries at the Centre:
(a) Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs.
(b) Ministry of Defence (in the case of cantonment boards)
(c) Ministry of Home Affairs (in the case of Union Territories)
